instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00609 - iMac error SMC PFM006
threads.message:
Hello friends,

I have this iMac 27 2017, it turns on, but with cooler at maximum and slow. Apple test software finds SMC error code PFM006.

Board has no signs of oxidation or short. Any lights to start?

threads.title: 820-00609 - iMac error SMC PFM006
threads.message:
Any history available?
Did the problem appear after machine was dissasembled?
Check if LCD temp sensor is properly connected.

threads.title: 820-00609 - iMac error SMC PFM006
threads.message:
No problem history!

iMac has never been repaired! I used HWMonitor, noticed "high temperatures" in some sensors, memory, PCH Die, Ambient.

threads.title: 820-00609 - iMac error SMC PFM006
threads.message:
So many errors can only appear if the communication bus is blocked; not a problem from a particular sensor.
Try first disconnecting webcam cable.

threads.title: 820-00609 - iMac error SMC PFM006
threads.message:
Same thing without the webcam.

I used TechTools Pro, didn't find any sensor errors.

threads.title: 820-00609 - iMac error SMC PFM006
threads.message: HWMonitors shows the same temps like before?

threads.title: 820-00609 - iMac error SMC PFM006
threads.message:
Yes, nothing has changed in HWMonitors.

With cooler on full and slow.

threads.title: 820-00609 - iMac error SMC PFM006
threads.message:
The closest schematic/boardview available is probably 00134.
Considering it as repair guide, you have a problem on U5650 area; search for it close to GPU power supply.
Check its solders, traces and R5650-52.

threads.title: 820-00609 - iMac error SMC PFM006
threads.message: Complicated when there is a schematic of the model! U5650 does not have or the chip is different. But I'm following logic to check the lines!

threads.title: 820-00609 - iMac error SMC PFM006
threads.message:
Thanks a lot for the help!

But the customer was urgent, he chose to change the license plate in the authorized one.
